item.title: Postgres Database Migration
item.description: Often times we find ourselves in situations where we need to migrate our databases from one server to another. Sometimes the reason can be infrastructure cost-cutting in our organisation or other times you may just want to do it for fun. Recently, I had to do one such migration for my team’s postgreSQL databases. My plan was to copy the schemas using pg_dump, then migrating the data using foreign data wrapper utility and finally updating the destination database’s sequences using the pg_dump again.
